metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27943 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: libiberty/rust-demangle.c in GNU GCC 11.2 allows stack consumption indemangle_const, as demonstrated by nm-new.

criterions.comment: gcc-7-cross package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-7-cross-ports package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-8-cross package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
